page.title: 12RELIGION IN FOUR LANES.
page.content: There are two places for worship in the area. The only one now in the village is the church, there was until 1982 a Methodist Chapel in the village but this was pulled down.Just outside the village at Pencoys is a large Methodist Chapel. The village has a resident vicar who lives in a fairly modern vicarage almost opposite the church. Regular services are held in both and the church runs a Sunday School.However it is fair to say that that neither is well attended.The Chapel congregation tends to be the Methodist older families of the district.
